attributes.name: Ash Armoire
attributes.description: Ash is also known as "firelight" wood, and gives off a wonderful long-burning heat due to its density. Not that you'd ever burn your beautiful ash armoire, of course.

attributes.name: Ash Cabinet
attributes.description: Some people claim that clothes kept in this ash wood cabinet will never go out of fashion.

attributes.name: Ash Chest of Drawers
attributes.description: Just imagining all the things you could put in these tiny drawers fills you with a sense of excitement.

attributes.name: Ash Dresser
attributes.description: This single-source dresser was crafted from the wood of one ash tree, which had lived a long, full life with no regrets.

attributes.name: Ash Large Bookcase
attributes.description: No metal fasteners were used in the joinery of this ash bookcase. Its craftsmanship is second to none.

attributes.name: Ash Small Bookcase
attributes.description: The top interior decorator in Aeternum adores the weathered look of this compact ash bookcase, making it a very popular piece.

attributes.name: Ash Wall Shelf
attributes.description: The flexible joints of this ash shelf can support the heaviest of collectible figurines.

attributes.name: Black-lacquered Galley Shelf
attributes.description: A cheeky combination of luxury and coziness that's sure to turn heads.

attributes.name: Black-lacquered Low Bookcase
attributes.description: The bookcase once housed the personal library of the child King. He enjoyed books with lots of pictures.

attributes.name: Black-lacquered Scrolled Armoire
attributes.description: A popular fairytale claims that Bluebeard told his new wife to never, ever, open this armoire.

attributes.name: Black-lacquered Short Dresser
attributes.description: The main thing that separates a good pirate captain from a legendary one is good costume design. This dresser can help with that.

attributes.name: Black-lacquered Tall Bookcase
attributes.description: The history behind this antique bookcase would make any museum curator green with envy.

attributes.name: Black-lacquered Tall Dresser
attributes.description: On windy nights, you can hear the skulls whisper fashion tips to one another. Or was that just a dream?

attributes.name: Black-lacquered Vanity Table
attributes.description: This gilded vanity was a custom order from a Dutch workshop that specializes in pirate d√©cor.

attributes.name: Ebony Apothecary Cabinet
attributes.description: In addition to all the normal drawers, this armoire also contains at least one secret drawer.

attributes.name: Ebony Circular Curio Shelf
attributes.description: Having this beautiful rosewood shelf on your wall is the perfect excuse to start some kind of whimsical collection.

attributes.name: Ebony Dresser
attributes.description: Perhaps you could stage a fun diorama behind the center doors. No one else has to know.

attributes.name: Ebony Pedestal Shelf
attributes.description: The right-angled bracing below the shelf is not only pleasing to the eye, but also helps distribute the weight.

attributes.name: Hardworking Galley Shelf
attributes.description: This shelf holds everything a well-stocked galley needs.

attributes.name: Hardworking Low Bookcase
attributes.description: A good library is a great comfort to a sleepless captain on those long, lonely nights at sea.

attributes.name: Hardworking Scrolled Armoire
attributes.description: This armoire has the perfect balance of craftsmanship, practicality, and skulls.

attributes.name: Hardworking Short Dresser
attributes.description: A safe and stylish place to store your finery.

attributes.name: Hardworking Tall Bookcase
attributes.description: This multifunctional piece of furniture serves as a bookcase, a writing desk, and a dresser. So practical!

attributes.name: Hardworking Tall Dresser
attributes.description: Look at all those drawers. You'll be able to store all your billowing silk shirts in here.

attributes.name: Hardworking Vanity Table
attributes.description: It's important to look your best while raining terror down on your enemies.

attributes.name: Jade Apothecary Cabinet
attributes.description: Ingredients kept in these jade drawers somehow stay fresh longer.

attributes.name: Jade Circular Curio Shelf
attributes.description: This piece is more than a mere shelf. What you place on it is immaterial. In itself, it is a monument to the taste and authority of its owner.

attributes.name: Jade Dresser
attributes.description: The best jade is slightly translucent. Best put anything embarrassing at the bottom of the drawer.

attributes.name: Jade Pedestal Shelf
attributes.description: This exquisite shelf is only big enough to display one item. Choose carefully.

attributes.name: Large Ebony Bookcase
attributes.description: This multi-level case is perfect for displaying all your curiosities.

attributes.name: Large Jade Bookcase
attributes.description: No need to buy fancy first editions. You could put any book on this shelf, and it would still look stunning.

attributes.name: Large Rosewood Bookcase
attributes.description: True interior design is not about the things you put on the shelves, but about the space you leave between them.

attributes.name: Large Teak Bookcase
attributes.description: The brass hardware on this antique bookcase is still in incredible condition.

attributes.name: Low Apothecary Cabinet
attributes.description: A low-slung cabinet of drawers, for keeping your heaviest treasures.

attributes.name: Mahogany Armoire
attributes.description: Just because you're a settler doesn't mean you have to settle for less than the best. This mahogany armoire is proof of your exquisite taste.

attributes.name: Mahogany Cabinet
attributes.description: The cubbyholes in this mahogany cabinet are the perfect place to store your various medals and commendations.

attributes.name: Mahogany Chest of Drawers
attributes.description: This chest has four drawers, one for each of the major accessory groups: capes, half-capes, falconry gloves, and socks.

attributes.name: Mahogany Dresser
attributes.description: This dresser has been burnished with a rich oil, to bring out the grain of the wood. Your unmentionables will be stored in luxury.

attributes.name: Mahogany Large Bookcase
attributes.description: This bookcase of gleaming mahogany lends you an air of confidence when you stand in front of it. Try it out!

attributes.name: Mahogany Small Bookcase
attributes.description: If you're going to go to the trouble of owning all these impressive books, you may as well display them in this impressive mahogany bookcase.
